channel.title: Poland on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Poland on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
LOT Polish Airlines Logo
LOT Polish Airlines, legally incorporated as Polskie Linie Lotnicze LOT S.A., is the flag carrier of Poland. Based in Warsaw and established on 29 December 1928, it is one of the world’s oldest airlines in operation. With a fleet of almost 100 aircraft, LOT Polish Airlines flies to over 120 destinations across Europe, Asia and North America. Most of the destinations originate from its hub at Warsaw Chopin Airport. LOT is a member of the Star Alliance.
You can download theLOT Polish Airlineslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: LOT Polish Airlines
item.description: LOT Polish Airlines, legally incorporated as Polskie Linie Lotnicze LOT S.A., is the flag carrier of Poland. Based in Warsaw and established on 29 December 1928, it is one of the world’s oldest airlines in operation. With a fleet of almost 100 aircraft, LOT Polish Airlines flies to over 120 destinations across Europe, Asia and North America. Most of the destinations originate from its hub at Warsaw Chopin Airport. LOT is a member of the Star Alliance.
